title: Personal Hygiene For Boys (second edition)
brief_description: Designed to increase the understanding of personal hygiene - this film shows the importance of proper rest, diet and exercise to good health and appearance. It also deals with the special problems teenage boys have regarding personal hygiene and the changes taking place in their maturing bodies.
